blurb: Microbes: how exposure to the right ones can be be a good thing
description: Why does the immune system sometimes go haywire and cause allergies? Scientists now think that a healthy immune system needs training early in life by unlikely allies: microbes. How can microbes be our friends in the face of allergies, and why are these disorders getting more common recently?
title: Hello Microbe My Old Friend: How a Diverse Microbiome Trains the Immune System against Allergies
